{"id":6613185626209,"title":"Glamorous Sandstone Belted Mini Skirt","handle":"brown-belted-button-up-mini-dress","description":"

Glamorous Women's Sandstone Belted Mini Skirt. This skirt is the the perfect combination of comfort and style this summer season. Featuring a chunky belt detail and flattering fit, we love this piece here at Glamorous. Pair with some white trainers and matching brown button up top for an effortless chic look this summer.

Composition: Shell: 100% Cotton, Lining: 100% Cotton

{"id":4868382261345,"title":"Glamorous Green Volume Sleeve Broderie Anglaise Mini Dress","handle":"green-volume-sleeve-dress","description":"

Glamorous Women's Green Volume Sleeve Broderie Anglaise Mini Dress. This bold and  sophisticated dress is the perfect fit for valentines day this year. Exaggerated sleeves and ruched front detail give this dress the fashion forward feel. Elevate the look with some white heels and a clutch this season.
